title: How to Make a Flaming Dr. Pepper

steps.headline: Make sure the bar area is clean and not cluttered.
steps.description: A suitable bar-tending area is always important, like one that can be easily cleaned and withstand spills without problems.

steps.headline: Grab your favorite beer and open it.
Pour the beer half full into a glass.
Fill your shot glass about 3/4 full with amaretto.
Carefully layer the 151 (or ever clear) to the top of the shot glass.
Sprinkle cinnamon on top of the shot.
Carefully place the shot glass inside the glass of beer.
Drink and enjoy the drinks' similar taste to a Dr. Pepper.
steps.description: If you're bold enough, drink "bottoms up" or simply blow the flame out.

steps.headline: Wow your friends by turning the lights out and watch the cool blue flame as you enjoy this drink!

text: Make sure the bar area is clean and not cluttered. A suitable bar-tending area is always important, like one that can be easily cleaned and withstand spills without problems. Get the glasses.  Grab your favorite beer and open it.  Pour the beer half full into a glass.  Fill your shot glass about 3/4 full with amaretto.  Carefully layer the 151 (or ever clear) to the top of the shot glass.  Sprinkle cinnamon on top of the shot.  Carefully place the shot glass inside the glass of beer.  Grab matches or a lighter.  Ignite the shot glass.  Drink and enjoy the drinks' similar taste to a Dr. Pepper. If you're bold enough, drink "bottoms up" or simply blow the flame out. Wow your friends by turning the lights out and watch the cool blue flame as you enjoy this drink!
